## Install

``` sh
pip install nbdev_tutorial
```

## How to use

In this tutorial we just implemented two functions

``` python
say_hello("Siegfried")
```

    'Hello Siegfried!'

``` python
say_hello_basque("John")
```

    'Kaixo John!'
